SEARCH
Package PDFjet.NET

Class CheckBox

Object
PDFjet.NET.CheckBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrawable
public class CheckBox extends Object implements IDrawable
Creates a CheckBox, which can be set Checked or unChecked. By default the Check box is unChecked. Portions provided by Shirley C. Christenson Shirley Christenson Consulting

  • Constructor Summary

    CheckBox(Font font, String label)
    Creates a CheckBox with black Check mark.
